amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to strike the prohibition on the reduction of the total number of nuclear armed Intercontinental Ballistic Missiles deployed in the United States.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the prohibition on the reduction of the total number of nuclear armed Intercontinental Ballistic Missiles deployed in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A015) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 156 - 270 (Roll no. 322).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A015) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A015) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 156 - 270 (Roll no. 322).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A015) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 156 - 270 (Roll no. 322).
